document_data.name: Kurishi Otobe
document_data.mainbody: '''Kurishi Otobe''', known as the '''Dragon Lady''', was a [[human]] [[wizard]] and a member of the [[Council of Captains]] of the city of [[Bral]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Kurishi was cloaked in mystery. Even during most meetings with business partners, she tended to remain hidden in the shadows.
document_data.Activities: Kurishi was a speculator and moneylender. She also purchased exotic goods and sold them later for profit. Dozens of loyal followers worked for her, most of them [[rogue]]s.
document_data.Relationships: The Dragon Lady was a rival to the [[Underbaron]] [[Ozamata Ku Murawa]], another of the members of the Council of Captains.
